page.title: 19EARNING A LIVING IN SETTLE
page.content: Most people who live in this area do not actually work on a farm. There is a small industrial estate which has {Paper Mill, Creamery, Coal Yard, {Builders Merchants, Joiners, Garage and{Vehicle Repairers},and on the old station yard there is a{Farm Suppliers and a{Timber Merchant}although not all of this site is occupied yet. The town has many more{shops}than could be needed by local people or even by the people who come for the Tuesday Market. Most of these shops rely on the{Summer vistors}who are either stopping on their way to the Lake District or on holiday in this area. Another important employer is the {Quarry}at Giggleswick. All of these industries lead to very heavy use of the roads but a{bypass}is planned.
